name: Vighnesh Mandavkar
bio: Heya! I am a B. Tech Comp. Science and Eng. 3rd Year student, currently enrolled in IIT Jodhpur. I am a full stack web developer, and I have also worked in various AI projects in domains like - Image Classification, Transfer Learning, Reinforcement Learning, Generative AI, ... and more. I love things that are an amalgamation of creativity and technology, which is why I also enjoy Game Dev and UI/UX design.
